response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This price reflects a fair balance between the product's value and my desire to make it accessible to someone who appreciates its potential impact. I look forward to your consideration and the opportunity to serve you with this outstanding product.", "product_price": 12000}
